abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Small and Medium Scale
            Industry Development Project plans to assist in financing
            economically and financially viable small and medium scale
            industrial enterprises through a credit line of US$27.5
            million to five participating banks. The project also
            includes technical assistance to assist small and medium
            scale industries (SMI) in resolving managerial/technical
            problems and in designing and formulating new or
            extension/modernization/rehabilitation projects. It also
            intends to help commercial banks develop the necessary
            expertise to improve their appraisal and supervision of SMI.
            The cost of technical assistance will be covered by US$0.5
            million from the loan amount and about US$2.15 million from
            local and bilateral sources.
